name: Varius The Dynamic Cosmic Defender
description: The game is Single Player only with some unlockables by getting enough star points. There's many modes and extras, Survival Mode and More! Brand new IP indie game which is an action flying platform game. Fly through many parts of the galaxy as a Cosmic hero and defend the galaxy as Varius in this classic 2D action game filled with traditional boss battles. Please support the game and further content will be added
